title: Aaron Carter reveals he is moving to Canada
text:
Aaron Carter is moving to Canada (Picture: Instagram)

Aaron Carter is moving to Canada.

The I Want Candy singer revealed on Twitter that he is leaving the US to set up home in Nova Scotia, while hitting out at Americans and insisting he needs a change of scenery.

Aaron’s impromptu move was sparked after he performed in Halifax and he told followers: ‘So I’m about to get a rental car and drive a few hours to go see my new home. I’m move fast.

‘My Brother in law Mike lives here and my niece Alyssa so I have family here and Nova Scotia is one of my FAVORITE PLACES IN THE WORLd! Plus it makes for shorter flights for Europe tour.’

Insisting the move is for the better, Aaron added: ‘I absolutely love my new peace of mind here. I’m very happy and have found solidarity, solitude and peace where I can’t be found and have my privacy make my music and enjoy a healthy long prosperous life.’

Aaron claimed he had purchased a $7million island in Kaulbach Island, Halifax and joked: ‘Good luck finding me. These waters get cold. I put 1.5 million down to get away from the drama and make my music.’

But, he didn’t stop there.

Aaron bizarrely went on to hit out at Americans in several posts that read: ‘I hope Canada welcomes me and doesn’t treat me the way people do in America it’s really foul I had to get out and I moved quick. Pun intended.

‘America isn’t foul I love my country Some people in it have been foul to me so need a change.’

He then tweeted a picture of him holding marijuana, while telling fans ‘it’s time to leave the USA’ and its ‘b***sh*t’.

Aaron’s rant seems a lot to take in, but it sounds like he’s hoping his move to Canada will be better for him long term.

The star has had a rough ride of late and caused concern when he accused his late sister Leslie, who died in 2012, of rape and his older brother Nick Carter requested a restraining order against him.

Nick accused Aaron of threatening to kill his wife Lauren and their unborn baby while she was pregnant.

Aaron seemed to apologise to brother Nick on Twitter, after it was revealed Backstreet Boys star Nick had welcomed his second child, a daughter, into the world with Lauren.

Aaron is seeking help for his mental health (Picture: Instagram)

Aaron, who recently had a huge tattoo of Rihanna as Medusa inked onto his face, also revealed he is seeking help for his mental health and is now receiving treatment.

During his latest Twitter outburst, Aaron took aim at another report focusing on his feud with brother Nick and said: ‘I think it’s best that we end of all this now. I moved 5,000 miles away and I already purchased my home.

‘At this time I ask you all to respect that I need a change of scenery for my life and I can enjoy my accolades in solidarity whilst maintaining my career and making music 24/7.’

Metro.co.uk have reached out to Aaron’s rep.
